def_cn: 英格兰的;英国的;英格兰人的;英国人的;英语的
def_en: English means belonging or relating to England, or to its people or language. It is also often used to mean belonging or relating to Great Britain, although many people object to this.
English is the language spoken by people who live in Great Britain and Ireland, the United States, Canada, Australia, and many other countries.
